en.header: If you face a chatty customer, you can multitask and keep working on other things while he is talking to you. True or false ?
en.klf: Don't ignore them! That will not improve the situation. Pay attention to what they are saying to grasp their main issue and refocus the conversation.
en.tips: Stay alert! If a coworker seems to have a hard time disengaging from a conversation, ask them for their help with something.

fr.header: Si vous rencontrez un client bavard, vous pouvez effectuer plusieurs tâches en même temps et continuer à travailler sur d'autres tâches pendant qu'il vous parle. Vrai ou faux ?
fr.klf: Ne l'ignorez pas ! Cela n'améliorera pas la situation. Faites attention à ce qu'il dit pour saisir le problème principal qu'il rencontre et recentrer la conversation.
fr.tips: Restez attentif ! Si un collègue semble avoir du mal à se dégager d'une conversation, demandez-lui de l'aide pour quelque chose.

de.header: If you face a chatty customer, you can multitask and keep working on other things while he is talking to you. True or false ?
de.klf: Don't ignore them! That will not improve the situation. Pay attention to what they are saying to grasp their main issue and refocus the conversation.
de.tips: Stay alert! If a coworker seems to have a hard time disengaging from a conversation, ask them for their help with something.
